pkgmetadata.longdescription: Moderation Analysis for Two-Instance Repeated Measures Designs // Moderation analysis for two-instance repeated measures designs, including simple slopes and conditional effects at values of the moderator. Based on Montoya, A. K. (2018) "Moderation analysis in two-instance repeated measures designs: Probing methods and multiple moderator models" doi:10.3758/s13428-018-1088-6 .
